meanings.definition: The craft or business of making cabinets.
meanings.sent1: My grandfather learned cabinetwork from his father and now makes beautiful cabinets.
meanings.sent2: The cabinetwork in the kitchen was expertly crafted and added a touch of elegance to the room.
meanings.sent3: The cabinetwork shop was so busy that they had to work overtime to finish all the orders.
meanings.sent4: Her cabinetwork skills were like magic, transforming simple wood into stunning pieces of furniture.
meanings.sent5: The intricate details of his cabinetwork were so precise that it seemed like a work of art.

meanings.definition: The cabinets in a room or building.
meanings.sent1: The cabinetwork in the living room was painted in a lovely shade of blue.
meanings.sent2: She organized her books neatly in the cabinetwork of the study.
meanings.sent3: The cabinetwork in the office was so full of files that it looked like a library.
meanings.sent4: The cabinetwork in the hallway held family photos and memories.
meanings.sent5: The cabinetwork in the bedroom provided ample storage space for clothes and shoes.
